title: Why hasn't Riot considered changing Yasuo's ultimate armor pen to scale per rank of ult?
body:
It seems following the mid-season update Yasuo's ultimate bonus armor penetration went untouched when other penetration items lost stats and tank/bruisers items lost health, but increased in resistances.  I main the champion (feel free to devote for this reason and this reason only), but playing against it, the 50% bonus armor penetration is quite powerful early-mid game when he had crit components for PD/Shiv or PD/Shiv themselves. (either 20% crit with brawlers glove, 40% with zeal, or 60% with PD/Shiv) he is getting the bonus armor pen (which lasts for 15 seconds) on a sizable portion or majority of his auto-attacks or Q's depending on what items he has early-mid game.

In my opinion, it should scale with each rank up of his ultimate, starting at say, 20, then going to 30 at rank two of ultimate, and then 40 at rank three. This would put it in line with other penetration items (while still being better than LW build paths by 5%). If Riot wanted to keep the 50% bonus armor penetration for later in the game, they could do 20-35-50, at each respective rank (or even 30/40/50 as someone from /r/yasuomains suggested). I think this would allow better counter-play for top-lane (since that seems to be the problematic lane) since he wouldn't be able to duel tanks so effectively with only PD/Shiv components or PD/Shiv themselves. Even more so with Zeal and IE being cheaper. I believe this would bring him more inline with the meta and other picks at the moment, since he gained a ton from the mid-season update while losing very little. This is the one thing I'm surprised Riot has left untouched for all these years on Yasuo, and if they move forward with other nerfs, I highly encourage them to consider this change before messing with his Q, W, or E again.

When a tank has ~80 armour, which would be Tabi+runes removing 20 of that armour is fucking huge.

Here's the math, 80 armour is a 0.55x multiplier, 60 is a 0.625x multiplier, so that means that knocking off 20 armour at this point is 12% increase in damage. That's a huge increase for a champ who already has insane base damage, especially when you consider how secondary of an effect it is.

Insane base damage? On Yasuo. Hah. His ult arpen only works off of crits now, so it's not even like it's a constant effect at level 6. Not only that, but a 12% damage increase is a pretty pitiful damage steroid when compared to... pretty much any other skirmisher.
And if it were an ability primarily designed around amping damage it wouldn't be an AoE suspend.

Yasuo's ult is really kind of odd. From raw damage to overall utility, the variance in its impact is enormous. If you use it to engage on a low-armor target, it's little more than a gap closer and atuo's worth of damage. Used in the middle of a skirmish, it can be aoe damage, aoe cc, a shield, and a chance to dive their back line. And yet it's gated by its conditional usability.

All of that aside though, I think it's fairly good, in terms of helping him to remain a target-agnostic threat. That's one the hallmarks of the skirmisher subclass, after all. His ult is **supposed** to be better against armored-up enemies.

>it's little more than a gap closer and atuo's worth of damage.

It's a lot more than a gapcloser and an AAs worth of damage. It's also a CC. This is kinda like saying Renekton's W is an auto reset an 1.5 AAs of damage, it makes no sense when you actually break down what the ability does.

>All of that aside though, I think it's fairly good, in terms of helping him to remain a target-agnostic threat. That's one the hallmarks of the skirmisher subclass, after all. His ult is supposed to be better against armored-up enemies.

I personally have one huge issue with it, it should only give him pen VS targets he actually hits with the ult. The fact that it just gives him a steroid VS everyone is utterly retarded. Honestly, 50% bonus armour pen for 15 seconds against all targets is ALREADY an ultimate, before the fact that it's also an AoE CC.

Engaging 1v1 against a single low-armor target with Yasuo's ult is exactly a gapcloser with AA damage. The CC doesn't matter since you're locked into it as well, its total damage is comparable to like 2 of your crits, and if you already had your shield up, the reset does nothing at all.

And no, 50% bonus arpen on a timer is not an ultimate. 50% bonus arpen is worth approximately ~1357 gp, and it's limited to his crits on top of that. It would make for a pretty pitiful ult if that was all it did.
You don't accound the -12% from tabi. Most of Yasuo's damage is from autos, and that -12% is also unpenetrable. It's pretty significant.
